float pandora::Cluster::GetTrackComparisonEnergy (  )  const [inline]

Get the best energy estimate to use when comparing cluster energy to associated track momentum, units GeV.

For clusters identified as electromagnetic showers, the corrected electromagnetic energy will be returned. For all other clusters, the corrected hadronic energy will be returned.

Returns:
The track comparison energy estimate
